title: Crowdsourced navigation from Waze is coming to 2018 Ford cars
description: ![Waze Social GPS, Maps &Traffic]()### Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how to enable it](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/how-to-enable-alexa-whisper-mode-echo-3607478 "Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how toenable it")  * “With the flexibility of our Sync 3 software and AppLink, customers can easilyuse Waze to get all the traffic and navigation help they need – on a bigscreen, and without having to fiddle around with their phones while driving.”Waze had been available in Ford cars that support Android Auto, but directintegration with Sync 3 means iPhones can also pipe Waze to the infotainmentunit without having to rely on [Apple’sCarPlay](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/bbc-iplayer-radio-on-android-auto-and-apple-carplay-3309090) interface. Although more widespread than a fewyears ago, CarPlay can’t yet be found across all the major car brands.The Waze integration into Sync 3 is pretty much the opposite of the high-endcar tech and machines being showcased at CES 2018. Nevertheless, it shows thatdriver-orientated connected car tech is growing, despite driverless carssupposedly being just round the corner.**What features would you like to see Ford add into its infotainment systems?Have your say on our Facebook page or tweet @TrustedReviews.**
